text: Have you explore automatic translation at all? Weblate seems to support a lot of options (<https://docs.weblate.org/no/latest/admin/machine.html>). E.g. Microsoft translator let's you translate 2 million characters per month for free (<https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/details/cognitive-services/translator/>) . It looks like the total number of characters in the source messages is ~0.25 million, so this allowance would be more than enough for all translation teams to use, giving a big advantage over Poedit (10 free messages).
